Posts.EditableText:
I went ahead and republished my Tutorials & Templates  "game" so it might help others.  I am aware that it is not perfect and the format/interface is not the best, but... if it helps anyone, why not put it back out there?

I put the link to this "game" here, in this sub-forum, because it's not really a game.  It's my solutions to a lot of the problems I have experienced in Quest.  Disclaimer: my solutions may not be the most efficient or simplest for all to understand but they work for me!

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/azkg8ntdweivkndr5j-ycg/quest-text-adventure-tutorials-and-templates

To make this more useful, you should also download the .aslx file but it is not necessary.

If you have questions, ask.
Posts.HTML:
